item.title: Graphic Handler
item.dc:creator: @meanz meanz
item.description:
@meanz wrote:

ouch i got theese errors.
i tought i had offset ints… but…

can any one help me get my offset vars?

heres my errors:
.\client.java:156: cannot find symbol
symbol : method distanceToPoint(int,int)
location: class client
if(person.distanceToPoint(X, Y) <= 60)
^
.\client.java:1104: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable offsetX
location: class client
GraphicsHandler.addSpell(90, absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 160, 91, 43, 31, 92, absY, absX);
^
.\client.java:1104: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable offsetY
location: class client
GraphicsHandler.addSpell(90, absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 160, 91, 43, 31, 92, absY, absX);
